channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Totally Inappropriate’: Get Ready for Next White House Rennovation Freakout Over Trump Changes
item.description: President Donald Trump surprised everyone as he proudly shared a few images of work that's been completed at the White House, but it's not work for the grand ballroom that's caused the left to freak out. This was done for the porcelain throne in the Lincoln bedroom. In a Truth Social post on Friday, Trump shared several pictures showing images of the bathroom in the Lincoln bedroom before the recent renovations and after.
